attributes.action: create a commerative five pound note in memory of Oliver Postgate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it would be nice to commerate somebody who has provided timeless episodes of bagpuss, clangers and most importantly Ivor the engine. thats why it would be green, if not, a fifty pound note could contain postgates's depiction of a welsh dragon.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Bank of England
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
